list.title: Depression Sensing App
list.description: An Android App that uses machine learning to diagnose depression using data collected from the user

list.title: Dijkstra Compiler
list.description: A full compiler built on top of Java JVM using ANTLR. Supports lexical analysis, syntax analysis, semantic analysis, type checking and code generation.

list.title: Super Mario Bros Artificial Intelligence
list.description: A genetic algorithm that plays through Super Mario Bros on the NES. Developed in lua, the approach utilizes iterative backtracking and "entropy" (mutation).

list.title: Interactive Puzzle Game
list.description: A puzzle game made from scratch in Java, implemented using the Model-View-Controller (MVC) software pattern. Learned hwo to design UI-driven Java applications using Swing framework during the course of this project.

list.title: This Website
list.description: Website of links to most of my projects

list.title: Student Assistant
list.description: Assisted students with homework and assignment inquiries for advanced computer science classes. Responsibilities involved grading homework and holding office hours with students.

list.title: Help Desk Specialist
list.description: Worked as part of a team assisting students and professors with technical issues. Assisted over email, by phone and in person.
